short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the coordinates of your mouse cursor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View the coordinates of your mouse cursor.

This extension will display the coordinates in the upper right hand corner of your screen.

The popup is draggable.

Just press the extension icon to turn it on or off.
